english.segment1: Listen . Can you hear it coming . Like a mighty rushing wind . Are you ready . For the blessed heat of . An all consuming fire
english.segment2: Pre-Chorus: Some will run and some will hide . Some will not know what to do
english.segment3: Chorus: As for me . I will lift my hands and sing.  You are holy, holy, holy, Lord (repeat)
english.segment4: Listen . To the distant rumbling . That's the angels singing . Worthy is the Father . To receive glory, blessing, and honor . Now it's getting louder . This is so exciting
